about_the_game:
Set in the haunting backdrop of an abandoned laboratory in rural India, players must uncover the chilling secrets hidden within its walls while facing unimaginable horrors.

Key Features:
1. Terrifying Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a world of dread and despair as you explore the eerie corridors and decrepit rooms of the abandoned research lab.
2.Mutated Monstrosities: Encounter grotesque creatures born from twisted experiments gone awry, each more horrifying than the last.
3.Hindi Voice Lines: Experience authentic immersion with voice lines delivered in Hindi, adding an extra layer of realism and atmosphere.
4.Survival Horror Gameplay: Use your wits and limited resources to survive the terrors that lurk around every corner, evading deadly traps and evoking a true sense of survival horror.
5.Rich Narrative: Piece together the tragic history of the research facility as you unravel the secrets of its past and confront the darkness that still lingers within.
6.Immersive Sound Design: Let the haunting soundscapes and spine-chilling soundtrack send shivers down your spine as you delve deeper into the abyss.

content_descriptors.notes: In our indie horror game, players will encounter intense moments designed to thrill and unsettle. Expect heart-pounding jump scares, a haunting background score that sets the eerie tone, and engaging shooting mechanics as you confront mutated monsters and other grotesque creatures. Our game delves into themes of survival amidst darkness, offering an immersive experience that challenges players to navigate through chilling environments filled with suspense. While our game does not depict sexual acts, it does feature graphic violence as players face off against terrifying foes. We want players to know that our indie title is crafted to deliver a uniquely immersive horror experience, but caution those who may be sensitive to themes of horror, violence, and intense gameplay to approach with care.

name: Project 38

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 10400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 10400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: "Project 38" plunges players into an abandoned research facility where mutated monsters lurk. Uncover the dark secrets within as you navigate eerie corridors and unravel a chilling narrative. With spine-tingling atmosphere and immersive Hindi voice lines, brace yourself for experience like no other.
